content: the resist hat is born of this moment a statement of resistance against oppression social injustice and abuse of power it s also a celebration of our democracy and solidarity show up raise your voice stand with community resist *as of august 2019 the resist hat is available as a free ravelry download there are also new charts available that work within the pattern design close the camps and climate action now those charts are included within the pattern images on this ravelry listing * -- **materials** - approximately 250 300 yards of fingering weight yarn in main color mc 100 150 yards in contrasting color cc - quince & co finch 100% american wool 221 yds/50g - 2 skeins in mc 1 skein in cc *shown in the following color pairings * honey mc and canvas cc fox mc and shell cc crow mc and egret cc bark mc and chanterelle cc delft mc and frost cc **needles** - one 16 circular needle in size us 2 2 75 mm or size needed to obtain gauge - five double-pointed needles in size us 2 2 75 mm or same size used in circulars to obtain gauge **gauge** 33 stitches and 38 row = 4 in stranded colorwork pattern on us 2 2 75 mm needles after blocking **finished measurements** - size small 17 5 circumference in stranded colorwork pattern main body of hat unstretched 9 5 from base of brim to crown unstretched - size large 20 5 circumference in stranded colorwork pattern main body of hat unstretched 10 from base of brim to crown unstretched suggested ease -2-3
